PixelSimilarity Class Reference

This class provides the location, radius and likelihood of a given potential head. More...

Detailed Description

This class provides the location, radius and likelihood of a given potential head.

Constructor given location, radius and likelihood.

Parameters:
point A point containing the x and y coordinates.
radius A float for the radius of the head in pixels.
